subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Jason Kidd had a triple-double with 16 points, 14 rebounds and 10 assists, and Richard Jefferson scored 22 points last night to lead the visiting Nets to a 93-88 victory against the Philadelphia 76ers.
snippet: Jason Kidd had a triple-double with 16 points, 14 rebounds and 10 assists, and Richard Jefferson scored 22 points last night to lead the visiting Nets to a 93-88 victory against the Philadelphia 76ers.
